Name: Basil Grande
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberries and basil leaves in shaker base. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass. Dust with black pepper.
Review: Fruity, with interest courtesy of the basil and a grind of pepper.
History: Created in 2001 by Jamie Wilkinson at Living Room, Manchester, England.
